column4:
Give the gift of homemade this Christmas. This holiday favorite makes up to one gallon of easy, delicious sweet pickles or pickled peppers to share with friends and family this holiday season. No cooking or canning required! Start with a jar of dill pickle slices or yellow pepper rings and follow the simple directions to complete with just a few basic kitchen ingredients. You will be amazed with the results and the raves you will receive. Packet includes the story "Legend of the Christmas Pickle." Start your own family tradition today!
Gluten-Free
Vegan
Available for a limited time only!

Our Chocolate Covered Cherry Dip Mix delivers an explosion of chocolatey decadence with every bite. The rich, velvety chocolate flavor is complemented by sweet cherry undertones, creating a chocolate cherry flavor profile that is simply divine. Great with graham cracker sticks, over a brownie, or just eat it with a spoon!
Vegan

What's better than a milkshake, you ask? A milkshake in dip form! Our Chocolate Milkshake Dip Mix is a chocoholic's dream come true. Crafted with top-notch ingredients, this mix is packed with all the chocolatey goodness you could ever want in a sweet treat.

Mexicali Dip Mix takes your dips to the next level with an expertly balanced blend of zippy peppers and a blend of cheeses. The mild spiciness adds excitement without overpowering, making this dip family-friendly. The smooth, creamy base ensures your chips will be scooped to the bottom of the bowl.
Gluten Free

This mouthwatering chipotle BBQ sauce mix infuses a touch of heat and a whole lot of flavor into every bite. The tangy spice and sweet molasses combine to create a rich, addictive sauce you'll want to slather on everything. Grill up juicy chicken, succulent shrimp, or sizzling ribs and take them over the top with this crave-worthy chipotle BBQ blend.

If you love spicy dips, this addicting jalapeño dip mix must be your next appetizer. Combining creaminess and heat, this versatile blend jazzes up any cracker, tortilla chip, or vegetable.
Gluten Free
Vegan

Chocolate fans and coffee lovers can enjoy mocha perfection anytime. Dip your favorite fruits, pretzels, or cookies into this decadent mix. Use it to enhance desserts, elevate breakfasts, or sweeten your afternoon. However you indulge, this mocha dip brings heavenly flavor to the everyday.
Vegan

column1: No Bake Mocha Latte Cheesecake Mix
column4:
Give in to your coffeehouse cravings without leaving the house. This cheesecake mix takes all the work out of creating a sensational mocha dessert. For the coffee lover who needs their fix in cheesecake form, this No Bake Mocha Latte Cheesecake Mix delivers.
Ve

column1: Taste of Michigan - Michigan Cherry Almond Dip Mix
column4:
Our Michigan Cherry Almond Dip Mix delivers sweetness from tart cherries balanced by the richness of almond. Every creamy bite is a delightful pop of summer flavor. You'll love having this easy appetizer on hand for game days, parties, or when unexpected guests drop by.
-Gluten Free

column1: Taste of Michigan Blueberries & Cream Dip Mix
column4:
This smooth and creamy blueberry dip will transport your tastebuds to the lush blueberry fields of western Michigan. Each luxurious bite bursts with the sweet yet slightly tart taste of plump, juicy blueberries. Whip up this easy dip to enjoy as a snack with fresh fruit, as a spread on muffins and bagels, or even use it in parfaits for a sweet twist on dessert.

-Vega

column1: Taste of Michigan - Michigan Dill Pickle Dip Mix
column4:
As the number one producer of pickling cucumbers, Michigan knows a thing or two about delicious dill pickles. Now you can recreate that authentic flavor at home with this zippy Michigan Dill Pickle Dip Mix. Super easy to make, just add sour cream and mayo - this creamy texture is perfect for dipping chips, veggies, pretzels and more!
-Gluten Free
-Vegan

column1: Taste of Michigan - Michigan Craft Beer Cheese Spread Mix
column4: Beer and cheese are a match made in heaven. The mellow notes of craft beer perfectly balance the sharp cheddar and jalapenos. This gourmet spread is sure to be the highlight of your party. Spread it on crackers, pretzels, tortilla chips or veggies for an instant crowd-pleaser.

When a chocolate craving strikes, Brownie Batter Dip Mix is the quick fix for experiencing chocolate nirvana in minutes. No oven required! This sinfully indulgent chocolatey goodness is a must to have on hand for gatherings or just for yourself!

The Frosted Sprinkle Cookie Dip Mix is perfect for anyone with a sweet tooth looking for a fun new way to satisfy cookie cravings. The sprinkle-filled dip makes an indulgent dessert or snack that brings joy to kids and adults alike.

On steamy hot days when you need to cool down fast, our raspberry lemonade mix is just what you need. This mix delivers the perfect balance of sweet and tart all natural flavors and colors - no artificial ingredients, for a cool drink that will transport your taste buds. Keep plenty on hand for impromptu gatherings with friends this summer!
Vegan
